word: H2904 - טוּל - ṭûwl - tool - Carry away

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - துரத்திவிடு, வரவிடு, எறி, போட்டுவிடு, எறிந்துவிடு,
a) (Pilpel) to throw away, to carry away, to hurl
b) (Hiphil) to throw, to cast, to cast out
1) to be hurled, to hurled down
2) to be cast, to be thrown, to be cast out, to be thrown down
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to pitch over or reel; hence (transitively) to cast down or out: - carry away, (utterly) cast (down, forth, out), send out.
Cognate: H2904, H2925
